biocode.fims.auth.oauth2

Class OAuthProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • biocode.fims.auth.oauth2.OAuthProvider

  • public class OAuthProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all aspects of oAuth2 support.

        public void deleteAccessToken(java.lang.String refreshToken)

      • validateToken

        public java.lang.String validateToken(java.lang.String token)
        Verify that an access token is still valid. Access tokens are only good for 1 hour.
        Parameters:
        token - the access_token issued to the client
        Returns:
        username the token represents, null if invalid token

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Given a hostname, register a client app for oAuth use. Will generate a new client id and client secret for the client app
        Parameters:
        args -
